tradestock.controller

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tradestock.controller.GUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, IController<Stock>

    public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController<Stock>, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This is a Trade controller control a trade program with a GUI. It contains a execute method to run the program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUIController(TradeOperation m, ButtonOnly v)
      Constructor of GUIController, it initializes the controller include model and view that use to run the program.
